generic <typename TEntity> where TEntity : classpublic ref class EntitySet sealed : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<TEntity>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TEntity>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<TEntity>, System::Collections::IList, System::ComponentModel::IListSource

summary.span: Permite la carga diferida y el mantenimiento de relaciones en el lado de la colección de relaciones de uno a varios y de uno a uno en aplicaciones de LINQ to SQL.

span.span: Provides for deferred loading and relationship maintenance for the collection side of one-to-many and one-to-one relationships in a LINQ to SQL applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El ejemplo de C# siguiente muestra un uso de este método:The following C# sample shows one use of this method: ``` var customer = (from c in db.Customers where c.CustomerID == "ALFKI" select c).Single(); Order[] orderArray = new Order[customer.Orders.Count]; ``` cliente. Orders.CopyTo (orderArray, 0), en Visual Basic:customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray,0);In Visual Basic: ``` Dim customer = (From c In db.Customers _ Where c.CustomerID = "ALFKI" _ Select c).[Single]() Dim orderArray As Order() = New Order(customer.Orders.Count - 1) {} customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray, 0) ```

summary.span: Especifica si ha cargado o asignado un valor.

span.span: Specifies whether the has loaded or assigned a value.

value.span: Devuelve true si ha cargado o asignado un valor.

span.span: Returns true if the has either loaded or assigned a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El término "Cargado" significa que los datos se ha cargado durante la materialización o en la carga aplazada."Loaded" means that the data was loaded during materialization or at deferred loading. "Asignado" significa que se ha dado manualmente los datos de un valor."Assigned" means that you have manually given the data a value.
